definition: to spend time in a bar (alcohol, Internet etc)/to go clubbing

bubble/foam/blister (i.e. skin bubble)/to soak/to steep/to infuse/to dawdle/to shilly-shally/to hang about/to pick up (a girl)/to get off with (a sexual partner)/classifier for occurrences of an action/classifier for number of infusions
puffed/swollen/spongy/small lake (esp. in place names)/classifier for urine or feces
(modal particle indicating suggestion or surmise)/...right?/...OK?/...I presume.
(onom.) smack!
bar (loanword) (serving drinks, or providing Internet access etc)/to puff (on a pipe etc)/(onom.) bang/abbr. for 貼吧|贴吧[tie1 ba1]

sentences.english: After the caves, all it took to complete a perfect day was a trip to the pub.
sentences.chinese: 參觀洞穴之後，讓泡吧來爲完美的一天畫上句號。

sentences.english: Today I went to a bar with two guys I was interested in.
sentences.chinese: 今天我和倆我感興趣的男生泡吧。

sentences.english: So, keep installing those energy-efficient light bulbs.
sentences.chinese: 因此，讓我們繼續安裝那些節能燈泡吧。

sentences.english: to party, club, you know, have good time.
For years, his only entertainment has been killing time in bars.
sentences.chinese: 多年來，泡吧成了他娛樂的惟一方式。

definition: nightclub
to drink (alcohol)
disco dancing/to dance at a disco
variant of 軋馬路|轧马路[ya4 ma3 lu4]
to play mahjong

to pick up girls/to play around with girls/to chase after girls
night life
a pack of rogues (idiom); a gang of scoundrels
to stay out all night (idiom)
disco (coll.)/diva (loanword)
to take a walk/to window-shop/to stroll down the street
to play mahjong or cards
to spend one's time in drinking and pleasure (idiom); to indulge in sensual pleasures/life of debauchery
